Text: SpaQuests spafanatic the Mexico issueDear Kimberly Hey spafanatics joinin the Mexican Madness This issue is dedicated to spa properties way south of the border Take a look at our featured spas or search for a spa in your area by clicking on spasearch or feel free to call us at SPAQUEST Enter our new spa sweep Win nights including meals and spa treatments at the Birdwing Spa in Minnesota Click here for more win Also new Ever been to a web page you like but leave then cant find it again Not anymore check out the bookmark this page feature on every spa page on the SpaQuest site And remember when looking for a gift forget the tie return the perfume a Spa Certificate is the way to go day SPA SPECIALZ Villa Bejar balances our spirits and our budget with an incredible package the includes airfare Hosteria hosts the nd spafanatic group tripsure to be a blast specialz INSIDE Qualton Club a REAL Mexican experience Moroma a hidden treasure in the Mexican Caribbean inside EXOTIC ESCAPES Sofias at it again our resident spafanatic tells us all about her recent Mexican vacation and shes got pictures A spafanatic falls in love with Ceiba del Mar escapes THANK YOU We would like to thank you again for registering to receive our FREE twicemonthly ezine You get updated on the latest deals exotic destinations inside news and information on spa treatments and spa tips spafantic also features recipes fitness and more Go ahead click spafanatic and be the first to know and the first to go If you would like to be removed from this list for any reason please reply with the word remove in the subject line
